GK18bharnatu:4934: yasyāstu traiṣṭubhe pāde vijñeyā svāgatā hi sā // BhN_15.49 //
GK18bharnatu:4937: āgatāsi bhavanaṃ mama yasmātsvāgataṃ tava varoru niṣīda // BhN_15.50 //

GK18bharnatu:4940: duḥśīlaṃ vā nirguṇaṃ vāparaṃ vā loke dhairyādapriyaṃ na bravīṣi /

GK18bharnatu:4955: nindyamadya kiṃ tvaṃ vigalitaśobhā candrapādayuktā kumudavatī ca // BhN_15.58 //

GK18bharnatu:4960: kumudanibhā tvaṃ kāmabāṇaviddhā kimasi natabhrūḥ śītavātadagdhā /

GK18bharnatu:4963: ādau pañcākṣaracchedaścandralekhā tu sā yathā // BhN_15.61 //
GK18bharnatu:4964: vaktraṃ saumyaṃ te padmapatrāyatākṣaṃ kāmasyāvāsaṃ sunāsoccaprahāsam /

GK18bharnatu:4983: karajapadavibhūṣitā yathā tvaṃ sudati daśanavikṣatādharā ca /

GK18bharnatu:4991: rāstrikāḥ sāgarākhyā niviṣṭā yadā syāt trike ca trike yuktarūpā yatiḥ /

GK18bharnatu:5005: kathaṃ nvidaṃ kamalaviśālalocane gṛhaṃ dhanaiḥ pihitakare divākare /

GK18bharnatu:5041: yadā ymau pādasthau bhavata iha cetstau tathā gau tathā ṣaḍbhiścānyairyatirapi ca varṇairyathā syāt /

GK18bharnatu:5051: mahānadyā bhogaṃ pulinamiva bhāti te jaghanaṃ tathāsyaṃ netrāḍhyaṃ bhramarasahitaṃ paṅkajamiva /

GK18bharnatu:5055: yadi hi caraṇe nsau slau gaḥ kramādviniveśitār yadi khalu yatiḥ ṣaḍbhirvarṇairstathā daśabhiḥ punaḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5056: yadi vihitaṃ syādatyaṣṭiḥ prayogasukhāśrayaṃ vṛṣabhalalitaṃ vṛttaṃ jñeyaṃ tathā hariṇīti vā // BhN_15.105 //
GK18bharnatu:5058: jaladhararavaṃ śrutvā śrutvā madocchrayadarpito vilikhitamahīśṛṅgākṣepairvṛṣaiḥ pratinardya ca /

GK18bharnatu:5060: catvāryādau ca daśamaṃ guru yatra trayodaśaṃ caturdaśaṃ tathāntye dve caikādaśamathāpi ca // BhN_15.107 //

GK18bharnatu:5064: atyaṣṭau ca pratiniyamitā varṇataḥ spaṣṭarūpā sā vijñeyā dvijamunigaṇaiḥ śrīdharī nāmatastu // BhN_15.109 //
GK18bharnatu:5065: snānaiścūrṇaiḥ sukhasurabhibhirgandhavāsaiśca dhūpaiḥ puṣpaiścānyaiḥ śirasi racitairvastrayogaiśca taistaiḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5067: ādyaṃ caturthaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ ca daśamaṃ naidhanaṃ guru /
GK18bharnatu:5069: yathā eṣa gajo 'drimastakataṭe kalabhaparivṛtaḥ krīḍati vṛkṣagulmagahane kusumabhiranate /
GK18bharnatu:5070: megharavaṃ niśamya muditaḥ pavanajavasamaḥ sundari vaṃśapatrapatitaṃ punarapi kurute // BhN_15.112 //

GK18bharnatu:5075: yadā dviruditau hi pādamabhisaṃśritau jsau trikau tathaiva ca punastayornidhanamāśritau yau lagau /

GK18bharnatu:5079: na me priyamidaṃ janasya bahumānarāgeṇa yanmadena vivaśā vilambitagatiḥ kṛtā tvaṃ priye // BhN_15.116 //

GK18bharnatu:5083: keśaiḥ snānāḍhyaiḥ kusumabharitairvastrarāgaiśca taistaiḥ kānte saṃkṣepāt kimiha bahunā citralekheva bhāsi // BhN_15.118 //
GK18bharnatu:5085: trayodaśaṃ dvādaśaṃ ca ṣaṣṭhamaṣṭamameva ca // BhN_15.119 //
GK18bharnatu:5087: pāde laghūni śeṣāṇi śārdūlakrīḍitaṃ tu tat // BhN_15.120 //
GK18bharnatu:5088: msau jsau tau guru ca prayoganiyatā yasminniviṣṭāstrikā ādyā cāntyayatiścatustrikayutā jñeyā parā saptabhiḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5089: nityaṃ yatpadamāśritā hyatidhṛtirnityaṃ kavīnāṃ priyaṃ tajjñeyaṃ khalu vṛttajātinipuṇaiḥ śārdūlavikrīḍitam // BhN_15.121 //
GK18bharnatu:5092: dhairyotsāhaparākramaprabhṛtibhistaistairvicitrairguṇair vṛttaṃ te ripughāti bhāti samare śārdūlavikrīḍitam // BhN_15.122 //
GK18bharnatu:5093: tāvattvaṃ vijitendriyaḥ śubhamate sarvātmanā pratyahaṃ dāne śīlavidhau ca yojaya manaḥ svargāpavargāpaham /
GK18bharnatu:5094: yāvad vyādhijarāpracaṇḍanakharo vyāyatsaṭābhirbhṛśaṃ mṛtyuste na karoti jīvitamṛgaiḥ śārdūlavikrīḍitam // BhN_15.123 //
GK18bharnatu:5095: catvāryādau ca ṣaṣṭhaṃ ca saptamaṃ sacaturdaśam /
GK18bharnatu:5096: tathā pañcadaśaṃ caiva ṣiḍaśaṃ naidhanaṃ tathā // BhN_15.124 //
GK18bharnatu:5097: etāni ca gurūṇi syuḥ śeṣāṇi tu laghūnyatha /
GK18bharnatu:5098: pāde yatra kṛtau jñeyā nāmnā suvadanā tu sā // BhN_15.125 //
GK18bharnatu:5099: mrau mnau ybhau lgau ca samyagyadi ca viracitāḥ pāde kramavaśād vicchedaḥ saptabhiḥ syātpunarapi ca yatiḥ saptākṣarakṛtā /
GK18bharnatu:5100: yadyeṣā saṃśritā syātkṛtimapi ca punaḥ śliṣṭākṣarapadā vidvadbhirvṛttajātau tata iha gaditā nāmnā suvadanā // BhN_15.126 //
GK18bharnatu:5102: netre līlālasānte kamaladalanibhe bhrūcāpavinate raktoṣṭhaṃ pīnamadhyaṃ samasahitaghanāḥ snigdhāśca daśanāḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5103: karṇāvaṃsapralambau cibukamapi nataṃ ghoṇā surucirā vyaktaṃ tvaṃ martyaloke varatanu vihitāsyekā suvadanā // BhN_15.127 //
GK18bharnatu:5104: catvāryādau tathā ṣaṣṭhaṃ saptamaṃ ca caturdaśam /
GK18bharnatu:5105: aṣṭādaśaṃ saptadaśaṃ tathā pañcadaśaṃ punaḥ // BhN_15.128 //
GK18bharnatu:5107: ekaviṃśatike pāde sragdharā nāma sā yathā // BhN_15.129 //
GK18bharnatu:5108: mrau mnau yau yaśca samyagyadi hi viracitāḥ syustrikāḥ pādayoge varṇaiḥ pūrvopadiṣṭairyatirapi ca punaḥ saptabhiḥ saptabhiḥ syāt /
GK18bharnatu:5109: vṛttaṃ samyagyadi syātprakṛtimanugataṃ tatvavidbhiḥ pradiṣṭaṃ vijñeyaṃ vṛttajātau kavijanadayitā sragdharā nāmatastu // BhN_15.130 //
GK18bharnatu:5111: cūtāśokāravindaiḥ kuravakatilakaiḥ karṇikāraiḥ śirīṣaiḥ punnāgaiḥ pārijātairvakulakuvalayaiḥ kiṃśukaiḥ sātimuktaiḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5112: etairnānāprakāraiḥ bahulasurabhibhirviprakīrṇaiśca taistair vāsantaiḥ puṣpavṛndairnaravara vasudhā sragdharevādya bhāti // BhN_15.131 //
GK18bharnatu:5113: caturthamādyaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ ca daśamaṃ dvādaśaṃ tathā /
GK18bharnatu:5114: ṣoḍaśāṣṭādaśe caiva naidhanaṃ ca gurūṇyatha // BhN_15.132 //
GK18bharnatu:5116: bhavanti yatra tajjñeyaṃ bhadrakaṃ nāmato yathā // BhN_15.133 //
GK18bharnatu:5117: bhrau caraṇe yadā viniyatau trikau kramavaśādathātikṛtividhau nrau ca tataḥ paraṃ ca rucirāvanantarakṛtau nagāvapi punaḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5118: tacca daśāṣṭavarṇaracitā caturṣvapi tathā yatiśca satataṃ bhadrakavṛttameva khalu nāṭyayogakuśalairbudhairnigaditam // BhN_15.134 //
GK18bharnatu:5120: bhadrakametadadya subhage vidagdhagaticeṣṭitaiḥ sulalitair nṛtyasi vibhramākulapadaṃ viviktarasabhāvitaṃ śaśimukhi // BhN_15.135 //
GK18bharnatu:5122: ekādaśaṃ saptadaśaṃ pañcamaṃ ca gurūṇyatha // BhN_15.136 //
GK18bharnatu:5124: vṛttaṃ tadaśvalalitaṃ vijñeyaṃ nāmato yathā // BhN_15.137 //
GK18bharnatu:5125: yadi ca nakāra ādiracitaḥ pade viracito 'nta eva lagau yadi ca nabhau tridhā ca nihitau krameṇa khalu madhyāvapi tathā /
GK18bharnatu:5126: yadi ca samāśritaṃ hi vikṛtiṃ yatiśca daśabhistathaikasahitais tata iha kīrtitaṃ munigaṇairviśuddhacaritaistadaśvalalitam // BhN_15.138 //
GK18bharnatu:5128: ripuśatamuktaśastraravabhītaśaṅkitabhaṭaṃ bhayākuladiśaṃ kṛtamabhivīkṣya saṃyugamukhe samarpitaguṇaṃ tvayāśvalalitam // BhN_15.139 //
GK18bharnatu:5130: viṃśaṃ saptadaśaṃ caiva trayoviṃśaṃ tathaiva ca // BhN_15.140 //
GK18bharnatu:5131: etāni ca laghūni syuḥ śeṣāṇyatha gurūṇi ca /
GK18bharnatu:5132: caturviṃśatike pāde meghamāleti sā yathā // BhN_15.141 //
GK18bharnatu:5133: yadi khalu caraṇasthitau nau trikau kṛtikāravyāstathā rāḥ syuḥ kramāt /
GK18bharnatu:5134: bhavati yadi yatistathā saptabhiḥ saptabhistriṣvato 'nyā yatiḥ pañca vidyāttathā // BhN_15.142 //
GK18bharnatu:5136: surapatidhanurujjvalābaddhakakṣyā taḍiddyotasannāhapaṭṭījvalā gaganatalavisāriṇī prāvṛṣaṇyā dṛḍhaṃ meghamālādhikaṃ śobhate // BhN_15.143 //
GK18bharnatu:5137: ādyaṃ caiva caturthaṃ ca pañcamaṃ ṣaṣṭhameva ca /
GK18bharnatu:5138: navamaṃ daśamaṃ caiva naidhanaṃ ca bhavedguru // BhN_15.144 //
GK18bharnatu:5140: vṛttajjñaiḥ sā tu vijñeyā krauñcapādīti nāmataḥ // BhN_15.145 //
GK18bharnatu:5141: bhmau yadi pāde sbhāvapi ceṣṭāvabhikṛtirapi ca hi yadi khalu vihitā nāśca samudrāḥ syurviniviṣṭā yadi ca khalu guru bhavati nidhanagatam /
GK18bharnatu:5142: pañcabhirādau chedamupetā punarapi yatiriha yadi khalu daśabhiḥ krauñcapadeyaṃ vṛttavidhāne suragaṇapitṛgaṇamunigaṇavihitā // BhN_15.146 //
GK18bharnatu:5143: yaḥ kila dākṣaṃ vidrutasomaṃ kratuvaramacamasamapagatakalaśaṃ pātitayūpaṃ kṣiptacaṣālaṃ vicayanamasamidhamapaśukacarukam /
GK18bharnatu:5144: kārmukamuktenāśu cakāra vyapagatasuragaṇapitṛgaṇamiṣuṇā nityamasau te daityagaṇāriḥ pradahatu makhamiva ripugaṇamakhilam // BhN_15.147 //
GK18bharnatu:5145: yā kapilākṣī piṅgalakeśī kaliruciranudinamanunayakaṭhinā dīrghatarābhiḥ sthūlasirābhiḥ parivṛtavapuratiśayakuṭilagatiḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5146: āyatajaṅghā nimnakapolā laghutarakucayugaparigatahṛdayā sā parihāryā krauñcapadā strī dhruvamiha niravadhisukhamabhilaṣatā // BhN_15.148 //
GK18bharnatu:5148: ekaviṃśaṃ ca vijñeyaṃ caturviṃśaṃ sanaidhanam // BhN_15.149 //
GK18bharnatu:5149: etāni guru saṃkhyāni śeṣāṇi ca laghūnyatha /
GK18bharnatu:5151: yasyāṃ mau to nāḥ strau nityaṃ praticaraṇamatha
GK18bharnatu:5169: meghamālādikaṃ tatsyānnau cādau kāguhā trikāḥ // BhN_15.153 //
GK18bharnatu:5174: muditajalacarākulāḥ saṃprakīrṇamalāḥ kīrtayantīva kīrtiṃ mahānimnagāḥ // BhN_15.154 //
GK18bharnatu:5178: grathitāḥ pādayogena tad vṛttaṃ viṣamaṃ smṛtam // BhN_15.156 //
GK18bharnatu:5179: dvau samaṃ dvau ca viṣamau vṛtte 'rdhaviṣame tathā /
GK18bharnatu:5183: pāde siddhe samaṃ siddhaṃ viṣamaṃ sārvapādikam /
GK18bharnatu:5188: dvitīye caraṇe ca syādityanuṣṭup samāsataḥ // BhN_15.161 //
GK18bharnatu:5189: sau gau tu prathame pāde srau lgau cāpi dvitīyake /
GK18bharnatu:5190: yugme 'rdhaviṣame pāde jñeyā pathyā tu sā trikaiḥ // BhN_15.162 //
GK18bharnatu:5192: priyadānaratā pathyā dayite tvaṃ priyāsi me // BhN_15.163 //
GK18bharnatu:5193: mrau gau tu prathame pāde ysau lgau ca dvitīyake /
GK18bharnatu:5194: pāde bhau lgau tṛtīye ca caturthe tu tasau lagau // BhN_15.164 //
GK18bharnatu:5195: naivācāro na te mitraṃ na saṃbandhiguṇapriyā /
GK18bharnatu:5196: sarvathā sarvaviṣamā pathyā na bhavasi priye // BhN_15.165 //
GK18bharnatu:5198: pathyā hi viparītā sā vijñeyā nāmato yathā // BhN_15.166 //
GK18bharnatu:5199: kṛtena ramaṇasya kiṃ sakhi roṣeṇa te 'pyartham /
GK18bharnatu:5200: viparītā na pathyāsi tvaṃ jaḍe kena mohitā // BhN_15.167 //
GK18bharnatu:5202: anuṣṭupcapalā sā tu vijñeyā nāmato yathā // BhN_15.168 //
GK18bharnatu:5203: na khalvasyāḥ priyatamaḥ śrotavyaṃ vyāhṛtaṃ sakhyā /
GK18bharnatu:5204: nāradasya pratikṛtiḥ kathyate capalā hīyam // BhN_15.169 //
GK18bharnatu:5205: vipulā tu yuji jñeyā laghutvātsaptamasya tu /
GK18bharnatu:5226: kva yāsyasi varoru suratakāle viṣamā kiṃ vānavāsikā tvam // BhN_15.180 //
GK18bharnatu:5227: sjau sgau ca prathame pāde tathā caiva tṛtīyake /
GK18bharnatu:5228: ketumatyāṃ gaṇāḥ proktāḥ bhrau ngau gaśca sadā budhaiḥ // BhN_15.181 //
GK18bharnatu:5230: kimidaṃ ruṣāpahṛtaśobhaṃ ketumatīsamaṃ vada mukhaṃ te // BhN_15.182 //
GK18bharnatu:5231: vaktrasyāparapūrvasya cādau nau ro lagau trikāḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5232: najau rajau dvitīye ca śeṣāgraṃ punareva tu // BhN_15.183 //
GK18bharnatu:5233: prathame ca tṛtīye nau ralau gaśca prakīrtitaḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5234: gaṇāścāparavaktre tu najau jrau dvicaturthayoḥ // BhN_15.184 //
GK18bharnatu:5236: kimidamaparavaktrameva te śaśivadane 'dya mukhaṃ parāṅmukham // BhN_15.185 //
GK18bharnatu:5237: nau yau tu prathame pāde njau jrau gaśca tathāpare /
GK18bharnatu:5238: yatra tatpuṣpitāgrā syādyadi śeṣaṃ tu pūrvavat // BhN_15.186 //
GK18bharnatu:5240: madhukaraparigīyamānaśabdaṃ varatanu paśya vanaṃ supuṣpitāgram // BhN_15.187 //
GK18bharnatu:5241: sjau slau cādau yathā nsau jgau bhnau jlau gaśca tathā punaḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5242: sjau sjau gaśca trikā hyete udgatāyāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // BhN_15.188 //
GK18bharnatu:5245: sjau slau ca tato nsau jgau nau sau ceti tṛtīyake /
GK18bharnatu:5246: sjau sjau gaśca caturthe tu lalitāyā gaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ // BhN_15.190 //
GK18bharnatu:5252: na ca tāni prayojyāni na śobhāṃ janayanti hi // BhN_15.193 //
GK18bharnatu:5254: dhruvāyoge tu vakṣyāmi teṣāṃ caiva vikalpanam // BhN_15.194 //
GK18bharnatu:5256: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi hyāryāṇāmapi lakṣaṇam // BhN_15.195 //
GK18bharnatu:5257: pathyā ca vipulā caiva caṣalā mukhato 'parā /
GK18bharnatu:5258: jaghane capalā caiva āryāḥ pañca prakīrtitāḥ // BhN_15.196 //
GK18bharnatu:5262: dvitīyāntyau yujau pādāvayujau tvaparau smṛtau // BhN_15.198 //
GK18bharnatu:5266: paścādardhe tu ṣaṣṭhaḥ syādekamātrastu kevalaḥ // BhN_15.200 //
GK18bharnatu:5267: dvivikalpastu ṣaṣṭho yo gurumadhyo bhavettu saḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5270: prathamādirathāntye ca pañcame vā vidhīyate // BhN_15.202 //
GK18bharnatu:5271: gaṇeṣu triṣu pādasya yasyāḥ pathyā tu sā bhavet /
GK18bharnatu:5272: ataśca vipulānyā tu vijñeyā yatilakṣaṇā // BhN_15.203 //
GK18bharnatu:5274: yasyāḥ syuḥ pādayoge tu vijñeyā capalā hi sā // BhN_15.204 //
GK18bharnatu:5283: paścādvā yo gaṇaḥ ṣaṣṭha ekamātraḥ sa ucyate /
GK18bharnatu:5284: dvivikalpastu yaḥ ṣaṣṭho gurumadhyo bhavettu saḥ // BhN_15.209 //
GK18bharnatu:5286: sā dvitīyā dvilaghukā saptame prathame yatiḥ // BhN_15.210 //
GK18bharnatu:5288: ayuggaṇo vidhātavyaḥ yuggaṇastu sa eva ca // BhN_15.211 //
GK18bharnatu:5289: prathamatṛtīyau pādau dvādaśamātrau bhavettu sā pathyā /
GK18bharnatu:5293: kasya tu pṛthumṛdujaghanā tanubāhvaṃ sodarī pathyā // BhN_15.213 //
GK18bharnatu:5301: pūrvārdhe lakṣaṇaṃ hyetadasyāḥ sa ca mukhena tu /
GK18bharnatu:5302: paścimārdhe tu capalā yasyāḥ sā jaghanena tu // BhN_15.217 //
GK18bharnatu:5304: āryāmukhe tu capalā tathāpi cāryā na me yataḥ sā kim /
GK18bharnatu:5305: dakṣā gṛhakṛtyeṣu tathā duḥkhe bhavati duḥkhārtā // BhN_15.218 //
GK18bharnatu:5310: vṛttajñaiḥ sā tu vijñeyā sarvataścapalā sakhi // BhN_15.220 //
GK18bharnatu:5312: aṣṭādaśa dvitīyaṃ ca tathā pañcadaśottamā // BhN_15.221 //
GK18bharnatu:5318: śeṣāṇi gurusaṃkhyāni hyevaṃ sarvatra nirdiśet // BhN_15.224 //
GK18bharnatu:5333: āśīḥ priyoktiḥ kapaṭaḥ kṣamā ca prāptiśca paścāttapanaṃ tathaiva /
GK18bharnatu:5335: ṣaṭtriṃśadetāni hi lakṣaṇāni proktāni vai bhūṣaṇasaṃmitāni /
GK18bharnatu:5336: kāvyeṣu bhāvārthagatāni tajjñaiḥ samyag prayojyāni yathārasaṃ tu // BhN_16.4 //
GK18bharnatu:5344: na yaḥ paryavatiṣṭheta so 'bhimānastu saṃjñitaḥ // BhN_16.8 //
GK18bharnatu:5346: doṣā na parikathyante tajjñeyaṃ guṇakīrtanam // BhN_16.9 //
GK18bharnatu:5350: prasiddhairupagūḍhaṃ ca jñeyaṃ protsāhanaṃ budhaiḥ // BhN_16.11 //
GK18bharnatu:5353: niruktaṃ dvividhaṃ proktaṃ tathyaṃ cātathyameva vā /
GK18bharnatu:5356: uttamārthaviśeṣo yaḥ sa cāpyatiśayaḥ smṛtaḥ // BhN_16.14 //
GK18bharnatu:5363: bahūnāṃ tu pradhānānāṃ madhye yannāma kīrtyate /
GK18bharnatu:5368: tīvrārthabhāṣaṇaṃ yatsyādākrandaḥ sa tu kīrtitaḥ // BhN_16.20 //
GK18bharnatu:5374: yattu priyaṃ punarvākyaṃ sā yāñcā parikīrtitā // BhN_16.23 //
GK18bharnatu:5376: nivāryate ca kāryajjñaiḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // BhN_16.24 //
GK18bharnatu:5380: nidarśanakṛtastajjñaiḥ sa dṛṣṭānta iti smṛtaḥ // BhN_16.26 //
GK18bharnatu:5392: akrodhaḥ krodhajananairvākyairyaḥ sā kṣamā bhavet // BhN_16.32 //
GK18bharnatu:5396: santāpo manaso yastu paścāttāpaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // BhN_16.34 //
GK18bharnatu:5399: prāptānāṃ yatra doṣāṇāṃ kriyate śamanaṃ punaḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5400: sā jñeyā hyupapattistu lakṣaṇaṃ nāṭakāśrayam // BhN_16.36 //
GK18bharnatu:5404: guṇābhivādaṃ doṣān vā kāryaṃ tallakṣaṇaṃ viduḥ // BhN_16.38 //
GK18bharnatu:5408: anyatrārthena sambaddhaṃ jñeyaṃ tat paridevanam // BhN_16.40 //
GK18bharnatu:5409: upamā rūpakaṃ caiva dīpakaṃ yamakaṃ tathā /
GK18bharnatu:5412: upamā nāma sā jñeyā guṇākṛtisamāśrayā // BhN_16.42 //
GK18bharnatu:5416: śaśāṅkavat prakāśante jyotīṃṣīti bhavettu yā // BhN_16.44 //
GK18bharnatu:5420: bahūnāṃ bahubhirjñeyā ghanā iva gajā iti // BhN_16.46 //
GK18bharnatu:5421: praśaṃsā caiva nindā ca kalpitā sadṛśī tathā /
GK18bharnatu:5422: yā kiñcitsadṛśī jñeyā sopamā pañcadhā budhaiḥ // BhN_16.47 //
GK18bharnatu:5424: dṛṣṭvā tu tāṃ viśālākṣīṃ tutoṣa manujādhipaḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5425: munibhiḥ sādhitāṃ kṛcchrāt siddhiṃ mūrtimatīmiva // BhN_16.48 //
GK18bharnatu:5428: vane kaṇṭakinaṃ vallī dāvadagdhamiva drumam // BhN_16.49 //
GK18bharnatu:5431: mataṅgajā virājante jaṅgamā iva parvatāḥ // BhN_16.50 //
GK18bharnatu:5439: śeṣā ye lakṣaṇairnoktāste grāhyāḥ kāvyalokataḥ // BhN_16.53 //
GK18bharnatu:5445: sarāṃsi haṃsaiḥ kusumaiśca vṛkṣā mattairdvirephaiśca saroruhāṇi /
GK18bharnatu:5446: goṣṭhībhirudyānavanāni caiva tasminnaśūnyāni sadā kriyante // BhN_16.56 //
GK18bharnatu:5448: kiñcitsādṛśyasampannaṃ yadrūpaṃ rūpakaṃ tu tat // BhN_16.57 //
GK18bharnatu:5463: tadvai pādāntayamakaṃ vijñeyaṃ nāmato yathā // BhN_16.64 //
GK18bharnatu:5470: pādasyānte tathā cādau syātāṃ yatra same pade /
GK18bharnatu:5475: rāmā rāmā vismayate ca smayate ca // BhN_16.68 //
GK18bharnatu:5482: ekaikaṃ pādamutkramya dvau pādau sadṛśau yadi /
GK18bharnatu:5484: sa pūrvaṃ vāraṇo bhūtvā dviśṛṅga iva parvataḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5487: cakravaccakravālaṃ tu vijñeyaṃ nāmato yathā // BhN_16.73 //
GK18bharnatu:5490: śailā yathā śatrubhirāhatā hatā hatāśca bhūyastvanupuṅkhapuṅkhagaiḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5492: ādau dvau yatra pādau tu bhavetāmakṣare samau /
GK18bharnatu:5494: paśya paśya ramaṇasya me guṇān yena yena vaśagāṃ karoti mām /
GK18bharnatu:5495: yena yena hi sameti darśanaṃ tena tena vaśagāṃ karoti mām // BhN_16.77 //
GK18bharnatu:5496: ādau pādasya tu yatra syāt samāveśaḥ samākṣaraḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5498: viṣṇuḥ sṛjati bhūtāni viṣṇuḥ saṃharate prajāḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5501: jñeyamāmreḍitaṃ nāma yamakaṃ tatra sūribhiḥ // BhN_16.80 //
GK18bharnatu:5502: vijṛmbhitaṃ niḥśvasitaṃ muhurmuhuḥ kathaṃ vidheyaṃ smaraṇaṃ pade pade /
GK18bharnatu:5503: yathā ca te dhyānamidaṃ punaḥ punardhuvaṃgatā te rajanī vinā vinā // BhN_16.81 //
GK18bharnatu:5504: sarve pādāḥ samā yatra bhavanti niyatākṣarāḥ /
GK18bharnatu:5510: lalī balī halī mālī khelī mālī salī jalī /
GK18bharnatu:5511: khalo balo 'balo mālī musalī tvābhirakṣatu // BhN_16.85 //
GK18bharnatu:5512: asau hi rāmā rativigrahapriyā rahaḥpragalbhā ramaṇaṃ manogatam /
GK18bharnatu:5513: ratena rātriṃ ramayet pareṇa vā na cedudeṣyattaruṇaḥ paro ripuḥ // BhN_16.86 //
GK18bharnatu:5515: kṣatairgavākṣairiva saṃvṛtājñaḥ sākṣāt sahasrākṣa ivāvabhāti // BhN_16.87 //
GK18bharnatu:5517: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi kāvye doṣān guṇāṃstathā // BhN_16.88 //
GK18bharnatu:5519: nyāyāvapetaṃ viṣamaṃ visandhi śabdacyutaṃ vai daśa kāvyadoṣāḥ // BhN_16.89 //
GK18bharnatu:5525: bhinnārthaṃ tadapi prāhuḥ kāvyaṃ kāvyavicakṣaṇāḥ // BhN_16.92 //
